Patent Information.Patent Title: Antimicrobial peptides and methods of identifying the same.
Patent Information.Abstract: Antimicrobial peptides and methods of identifying the same are provided.

Sequence Information.Peptide Name: LL-37(13-37)(C-terminal fragment of LL-37; Human, mammals, animals)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-negative bacterium:Escherichia coli K12 (MIC=80 µM).Drug-resistant KBv cancer cells (LC50=39 µM), Drug-sensitive KB cancer cells (LC50=40 µM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Comments: The slightly lower activity of LL-37(13-37) may result from the interference of the disordered regions with membrane binding of the peptide.

Literature.Title: Solution structures of human LL-37 fragments and NMR-based identification of a minimal membrane-targeting antimicrobial and anticancer region.
Literature.Author: Li X, Li Y, Han H, Miller DW, Wang G.
